title: Nanomaterials for light-mediated therapeutics in deep tissue
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,2898-2931
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00862B, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chung Yin Tsang, Yong Zhang
Different activation modes, including chemiluminescence, NIR, X-ray and ultrasound, have been employed to trigger specific light-mediated therapeutics, such as photodynamic therapy, photothermal therapy and drug delivery.
